analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#791-792) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1075-1082)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1084-1090)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1148-1160)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#796-797) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1148-1160)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1589-1590)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1123-1133):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1130-1131)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1131-1133)

	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_adr,amountToRelease) (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol)

SafeMathLib.safeAdd (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#19-24) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(c >= a) (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#22-24)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1291-1302) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1297-1302)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1296-1302)

TokenVesting.isVestingSet (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1634-1640) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vestingMap[adr].principleLockAmount != 0 || vestingMap[adr].bonusLockAmount != 0 (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol#1638-1639)

TokenVesting.releaseVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= vestingSchedule.bonusLockPeriod && ! vestingSchedule.isBonusReleased (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol)
	- block.timestamp >= vestingSchedule.principleLockPeriod && ! vestingSchedule.isPrincipleReleased (/unique_chucks/1/0xeda8b016efa8b1161208cf041cd86972eee0f31e.sol)
